5 Facts About Mona Singh

Biography

Mona Singh was born in India on October 8, 1981. Known for her starring role in the Indian soap opera Kya Huaa Tera Vaada and for her performance in the 2009 film 3 Idiots, this Indian Television Academy Award-winning actress also participated in and hosted numerous reality TV programs. She and Sanaya Irani were both in the cast of the soap opera Radhaa Ki Betiyaan Kuch Kar Dikhayengi. At the start of her acting career, she won Aspara and Indian Telly awards for her role in the television series Jassi Jaissi Koi Nahin (the Indian version of Ugly Betty).

On Popular Bio, She is one of the successful TV Actress. She has ranked on the list of those famous people who were born on October 8, 1981. She is one of the Richest TV Actress who was born in India. She also has a position among the list of Most popular TV Actress. Mona Singh is 1 of the famous people in our database with the age of 37 years old.
